value: content=Is one of the nation's premier collections of American artifacts.
is a maker of teddy bears.  They have a company store as well as a factory tour for people to see how the bears are made.  They also have bears available that you can have stuffed while you watch.

is a great place for all ages.  Kids will like bringing their parents to the Children's Farmyard and everyone likes the cheese.  The grounds and buildings are amazing and there are events in every season.  Be sure to walk up Lone Tree Hill behind the Farm Barn.  The view is not to be missed.  http://www.shelburnefarms.org
has a nice little gallery located on the town green in the center of town.  http://www.shelburnecraftschool.org/
, Shelburne Shopping Park (off Falls Rd.), 985-1118.  Sotera's is in the space formerly occupied by Fibonacci's Pizza.  Sotera's still has pizza and has added some Greek food.
